document_data.mainbody:
Bristar Risingsun was a half-elf wizard inhabiting the city of Ammathtar in northeast Dambrath during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Bristar was the consort of the Duchess of the North, Tralia Falrith, following the demise of her previous consort, Skield. He was not a native of Dambrath.
